MBS v118124f ^SECRETBATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 23rd JUNE, 1913WESTERN FRONTThere is nothing of interest to report,2 * aTAIIAN FRONT oThe enemy has generally been inactive since evening of20th June.Third Army. During the night of 21st/22nd an enemy attack towards LOSSON was repulsed with heavy loss. The Italians further extended their bridge-head at CAVAZUGCHERINA, capturing 150 prisoners.' Eighth Army * On 21st tho Italians advanced their line slightly to 9QLESEL DI OASTELVIERO, The Austrians made local attacks on the night of 21st/22nd against the right and left af the Italian line on the MOWTELLO.$ejr r .l9 The PIAVE is falling, and will probably soon be fordabie in places.-General Staff,far Office* S0W.l.Fop the"123rd June, 1918.Issued at 12*35 p*nw
